quick_delivery.title: Quick Delivery
quick_delivery.description: Our quick delivery service ensures your parcels reach their destination in record time. Enjoy efficient logistics and complete transparency.

real_time_tracking.title: Real-time Tracking
real_time_tracking.description: Track your parcel in real-time with our advanced technology. Stay informed at every step of the delivery process.

tariff.title: List of Serviced Cities
tariff.description: Discover our competitive tariffs for each destination. No hidden costs, just complete transparency.

card.description: AMEEX delivers to over 80 destinations across Morocco, covering urban and rural areas.

footer.description: Enhance your delivery experience with AMEEX. Click below to start your shipment.

advantages.title: Additional Advantages
advantages.description: AMEEX goes beyond just delivering parcels; we elevate your logistical experience to the next level by offering a range of additional advantages.

footer.description: At AMEEX, we don't just deliver parcels; we provide a comprehensive logistical experience tailored to your needs. Enjoy these additional advantages and discover how our delivery service can enhance your daily life.

FAQ.title: FAQs on Delivery Service
FAQ.description: Check out our FAQ for quick answers to common questions about our delivery service.

form.delivery_message: Ask us a question about delivery
